TEXT.English: Additional Requirements:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only spread to cities on the historical route[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cannot spread after 1500 AD[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Attracted by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Slaves and additional company resources (especially Gold resources)[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Adopting the Merchant Trade or Free Enterprise civics[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Location is in Subsaharan and Northeast Africa[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Markets and Stables[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Trade routes[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Coastal Cities[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Deterred by:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Catholicism and Protestantism[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Too many other companies present
